Some of my favorite things to do are making Spotify playlists and listening to albums! Sharing good music is definitely a love language of mine, and I love getting new recommendations from my friends. I have a soft spot in my heart for some good ol' fashioned pop music, but my *true* for-lifer is Green Day (since 7th grade!). Whether I'm biking to class, doing the dishes, or sitting down to work on my assignments, there's always something playing.
